titles.title: Ensuring Full Participation in the Census Act of 2022
Ensuring Full Participation in the Census Act of 2022
To amend title 13, United States Code, to prohibit the use of questions on citizenship, nationality, or immigration status in any decennial census, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Ensuring Full Participation in the Census Act of 2022
This bill prohibits the Bureau of the Census from using questions regarding citizenship, nationality, or immigration status in the decennial census. The bill does not apply to the American Community Survey.
